staxel.village.dialogue.job.Scientist.li: Sorry ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
I'm in the middle of making an incredible breakthrough!
Could you come back a bit later?
Hmm...
I'm looking for some test subjects for a new experiment.
Does that seem appealing to you ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
I can't really pay you or anything...
But it could help advance humankind to the next stage of evolution!
Alternatively, you might turn into a bug.
The odds are only slightly in favour of turning into a bug.
Around 8:1 I'd say. Not bad right?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Stop right there!
Phew, that was a close call!
One more step and you'd have ruined this timeline too!
I really didn't want to have to start over again...
T-t-time machine?!
Who told you about that?!
I have no such thing!
I thought I was the only one tapping phones...
It's been weeks and I've yet to hear anything...
The mayor promised to look over all the paperwork!
Surely it can't have been rejected?
Can they not see how beneficial the implants would be for the village?
I've been working on this bionic eye for the past year.
Would you like to be a test subject? It won't hurt.
We just stick a third eye to your forehead.
The WiFi will do the rest!
What? Your nervous system isn't WiFi compatible yet?
Hmm... never mind then.
Someday...
Someday I'll convince the mayor to approve my plans.
Then I'll build my own hadron collider under the town!
No more questions about cryptids please!
Oh, sorry. I thought you were someone else.
He keeps asking me about them...
I only deal with real science though...
